Uses of Class
PokerProject.Card

  • Packages that use Card 
    Package Description
    PokerProject  
    Variants  

    • Uses of Card in PokerProject

      Methods in PokerProject that return Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card Deck.draw()
      Gets the first card from the deck, returns it and removes it from the deck since it can't be drawn again.
      Card[] Player.getHand()
      Gets the current hand of the player (5 cards).

    • Uses of Card in Variants

      Methods in Variants with parameters of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Variants.evaluation(Card[] hand)
      Evaluates a specific hand according to the variant on use and outups the result.
      int DoubleBonus.evaluation(Card[] userHand)
      Returns an integer that corresponds to the hand type.
      int[] Variants.getAdvice(Card[] hand)
      Gets the advice for which cards to hold according to both the hand and the variant on use.
      int[] DoubleBonus.getAdvice(Card[] userHand)
      Returns an array that contains the index of cards to hold by the user according to the strategy to win a hand.
      static int DoubleBonus.getPosCard(Card[] hand, int cardValue, int cardSuit)
      Returns the position in the hand array (1..5) of a card with a specific value (0..12) and a specific suit (0..3).
